gota niyojanaya karana jathiwadi saha aagamwadi balawegayan prabala wuwada ema balawegayan niyojanaya sandaha ohuge yogya bawa pilibanda dadi wirodhayan ema kandawure samahara nayakanayan gen ella wi atha.emanisa gota ge yojana kramaya siduwiya hakkak bawa ta sahathika kala nohaka.eya ese wuwahoth gota genawith janathawata prajathanthrawadaye watinakama iganwime nirmalge sihinaya saba nowanu atha.meya prajathanthrawadi wyaparayata siduwana paduwak lesa ohu dakinnata puluewan kama aththe ee pilibandawa kalaka siti sahena bala poroththu sahitha kathikawak ohu goda naga athi bawini.
ema kandayame sudanama idiri palath palana mathiwaranaya ilakka karagena eksath janatha nidahas sandhanaya lesa deshapalana katayuththaka niratha wimaya.

indiya bhu deshapalanaya samanga rajya thanthrika ayurin katayuthu kirima kerehi ejapaya wishesha awadhanaya yomukara thibe. 1987 di aandukrama wyawasthawata 13 wana sanshodhanaya handunwadimen athi kala palath sabha kramaya osse eksath jathika pakshaya wisin jathinge eksathkama aaraksha kirimata thibena unanduwa prayogikawa pennum kara thibe.
efisas hi dyukwaraya wana solinas idiriye eejin siya “kiya nohaki tharam shochaniya wu” kathawa diga hariyi.
